abstract: We provide relationships between the spectral convergences in BÃ©rard-Besson-Gallot sense, in Kasue-Kumura sense and the measured Gromov-Hausdorff convergence, for compact finite dimensional RCD spaces. As an independent interest, a canonical approximation map between such spaces with respect to spectral datas is obtained.
publication_venue: Theorem 1.3 is slightly improved, and a new result on noncollapsed spaces, Corollary 4.3, is added. 25 pages
